QuestData.Title: Troublesome Troglodytes
QuestData.Description: Troggs are base creatures. They barely have any brain process, living mostly on survival instinct alone. They are pests through and through, and need to be dealt with.$b$bThe fewer of them there are, the better.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Grimestone Bullies and $2oa Grimestone Throwers in Mistfall Cleft.
QuestData.CompletionText: The troggs attack passers-by and take whatever... or whomever... they want for food. Enough is enough!
QuestData.RewardText: Fewer troggs means fewer of our people getting attacked.
